# Private Access Control

> Demonstrates how to grant decryption permissions to other users.

## Overview
This example demonstrates FHEVM capability using **AccessControl**.
It is generated automatically using the FHEVM Example Hub.

The contract is located at `contracts/AccessControl.sol`.

### Key Functions
